name: BorrowMyDoggy Limited
description: Provider of pet sitter services designed to connect pet owners with local dog borrowers for walks, weekends, and holidays. The company helps to link pet owners with local sitters for walks, home boarding, and holiday care, enabling dog owners to give dogs more exercise and playtime and allowing people without a pet to spend quality time with one.
one_liner: Provider of pet sitter services designed to connect pet owners with local dog borrowers for walks, weekends, and holidays. The company helps to link pet owners with local sitters for walks, home boarding, and holiday care, enabling dog owners to give dogs more exercise and playtime and allowing people without a pet to spend quality time with one.
